pkgmetadata.longdescription: ============================rinoh-typeface-texgyrecursor============================This package provides the `TeX Gyre Cursor`_ typeface for use with rinohtype_.TeX Gyre Cursor is based on URW Nimbus Mono L and can be used as a replacementfor Courier... _TeX Gyre Cursor: http://www.gust.org.pl/projects/e-foundry/tex-gyre/cursor.. _rinohtype: https://github.com/brechtm/rinohtype#readme
